task: Discover which year Cristiano Ronaldo scored the most goals in a single season. Current date is: 2025-01-06.
observation:
Based on the most recent observations, Cristiano Ronaldo scored the most goals in a single season during the 2011-2012 period, with 69 goals in total (60 for Real Madrid and 9 for Portugal). The search results also indicate other remarkable goal tallies for him in that timeframe, notably his record in the UEFA Champions League with 17 goals scored during the 2013-14 campaign. Additionally, he scored 61 goals in all competitions in another season.
